Detailed Description

The record of the client book-keeping structure.

Field Documentation

unsigned client_record::amount

Number of FLOOD packets to be received.

struct sockaddr_in client_record::client_addr [read]

The primary client address.

unsigned long long client_record::delta

Time diff in microsecond.

time_t client_record::died_at

Unix epoch time at which the client dies.

uint32_t client_record::id

The means to identify a client for an address update.

bool client_record::is_out_of_order

1 or more FLOOD packet is out of order.

bool client_record::is_set

Not yet set.

int client_record::max_gap

Maximum length of a gap.

struct { ... } client_record::max_latency

Maximum time diff between prev & curr FLOOD.

struct { ... } client_record::min_latency

Minimum time diff between prev & curr FLOOD.

int client_record::num_of_gaps

Number of gaps.

struct { ... } client_record::prev_packet

The previous FLOOD packet.

int client_record::recvd_packets

Number of FLOOD packets received.

uint16_t client_record::seq

Sequence of previous FLOOD packet.

unsigned long long client_record::sleep_time

The sleep time in microsecond.

unsigned long long client_record::total_latency

The sum of all time diffs between two FLOOD.

unsigned long long client_record::ts

Timestamp of previous FLOOD packet.
